intro_text: The leaves are starting to turn colors; the patrol knows leaf-bare will be here soon
success_text: For now, hunting is still good
fail_text: A chilly wind makes it difficult to hunt

intro_text: r_c stalks a squirrel under a tree
success_text: They use the leaf-fall foliage to their advantage and catch the squirrel easily
fail_text: Leaves crunch under their paws and the squirrel gets away
decline_text: r_c decides to go after other prey instead
